languages.text:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text:
Если {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа снижается до 0, он не теряет сознание, а вместо этого немедленно восстанавливает {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} здоровья под действием стазис-поля и тратит все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, если таковые есть. В течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} он получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и не может восстанавливать ОП.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

traits.locale_text:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Werden die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers auf 0 reduziert, wird er nicht bewusstlos. Stattdessen regeneriert er sofort +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} Wunden durch das Stasisfeld, verbraucht alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} (sofern vorhanden), erhält 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und kann keine BP regenerieren.
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Werden die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers auf 0 reduziert, wird er nicht bewusstlos. Stattdessen regeneriert er sofort +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} Wunden durch das Stasisfeld, verbraucht alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} (sofern vorhanden), erhält 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und kann keine BP regenerieren.
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
Si les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur tombent à 0, il ne perd pas connaissance. Au lieu de cela, il récupère immédiatement +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} blessures conférées par le champ de stase. Il perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} s'il en a, mais bénéficie pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de +30% d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, sans pouvoir regagner de PD.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Si les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur tombent à 0, il ne perd pas connaissance. Au lieu de cela, il récupère immédiatement +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} blessures conférées par le champ de stase. Il perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} s'il en a, mais bénéficie pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de +30% d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, sans pouvoir regagner de PD.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text:
当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时，不会陷入昏迷状态，而是会立刻通过静态立场恢复{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点生命值，同时消耗全部{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。在接下来的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高30%，但无法获得移动点数。
！此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。
languages.original_text:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时，不会陷入昏迷状态，而是会立刻通过静态立场恢复{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点生命值，同时消耗全部{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。在接下来的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高30%，但无法获得移动点数。
！此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。

当装备者即将陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，会立刻恢复部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。装备者会失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
！此效果每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text:
Si las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reducen a 0, no queda inconsciente en ese momento. En vez de eso, recupera +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} heridas por el campo de suspensión, gasta todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tenga y, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y no puede recuperar PM.
! Solo se puede usar una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Si las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reducen a 0, no queda inconsciente en ese momento. En vez de eso, recupera +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} heridas por el campo de suspensión, gasta todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tenga y, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y no puede recuperar PM.
! Solo se puede usar una vez por combate.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、ステイシスフィールドは直ちに{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}分の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを失うが、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を30%獲得する。
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、ステイシスフィールドは直ちに<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}の負傷{/g}から回復する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを失うが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を30％獲得する。
！1回の戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、ステイシスフィールドは直ちに<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}の負傷{/g}から回復する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを失うが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を30％獲得する。
！1回の戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。

! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

В течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} он получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и не может восстанавливать ОП.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı 0'a inerse baygın düşmez. Bunun yerine staz alanının sağladığı +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} sağlık puanını anında geri kazanır, varsa tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} harcar ve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} +%30 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanırken HP'sini ise tazeleyemez.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.

Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
